name: test_e2e_with_logs[CMD_BASIC_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASIC_005` |
| **Name** | Password file access attempt |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | basic_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; cat /etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20cat%20/etc/passwd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_CMDI_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | Command Injection Attack |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_005-1765109471370-c1rndr pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_005 uri=/?q=%3B%20cat%20/etc/passwd client=127.0.0.1 |
| **Match Status** | `MISMATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~5000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:11:11.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_005-1765109471370-c1rndr pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_005 uri=/?q=%3B%20cat%20/etc/passwd client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
12:11:11.000000000: Critical [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_005-1765109471370-c1rndr pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_005 uri=/?q=%3B%20cat%20/etc/passwd client=127.0.0.1
```
